name: raidhack
description: RAIDHack - Cloudflare Pages + Workers Hello World

scripts.watch:api: nodemon --watch api/src --ext ts,js --exec "cd api && npm run dev"
scripts.watch:web: nodemon --watch web --ext html,js,css --exec "cd web && npm run dev"
scripts.deploy:web: cd web && npx wrangler pages deploy . --project-name raidhack-web
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:api && npm run deploy:web
